messages.didYouKnowMessage: There is an area of the Pacific Ocean three times the size of France which contains 80 000 tonnes of plastic rubbish
359 million tonnes of plastic were produced in 2018 (Almost 50 kg of plastic for every person on the Planet)
Only 2% of the world’s plastic is recycled into similar products. 8% is recycled to make lower-value plastics. The rest is burned, put in landfill, or leaks into the environment.
In 2014, 6% of the world’s oil consumption was used for making plastics.
In 2015 it was estimated that 12.7 million pieces of plastics entered the ocean every year
40% of plastic is produced for packaging and is only used once before being disposed of
